channel.title: Boat on Om Wani
channel.description: Recent content in Boat on Om Wani

item.title: Have you been to Vasota?
item.description:
if not, you should, specially during winters. i recently went for the trek with my cousins this december.

day 0 : planning

i was thinking of planning a trip somewhere to chill as i had not went out anywhere since a long and coincidently Shivam (my cousin) called and asked, “wanna plan and go somewhere?, Pratik (my other cousin) is in town.” so i immediately said yes. we discussed and decided to go Vasota with a trekking group.
